pin-fixer.title: Pin Fixer
pin-fixer.description: Make map pins scale less dramatically with zoom level.

enable.name: Enable
enable.hint: Enable Pin Fixer on this scene.

pinLocker.name: Lock Pins On Other Layers
pinLocker.hint: Prevent pins from being dragged when not on the notes layer.

minScale.name: Min Scale
minScale.hint: The smallest scale for map pins (zoomed all the way out).

maxScale.name: Max Scale
maxScale.hint: The largest scale for map pins (zoomed all the way in).

zoomFloor.name: Zoom Floor
zoomFloor.hint: The pin scale won't change when zoomed out further than this.

zoomCeil.name: Zoom Ceiling
zoomCeil.hint: The pin scale won't change when zoomed in further than this.

hudScale.name: Pin HUD Scale
hudScale.hint: Some modules, such as Pin Cushion and POI Teleporter add HUDs to map pins. This setting adjusts scale factor for those HUDs.

aboveFog.name: Show Map Pins Above Fog
aboveFog.hint: Map pins and labels will display above the fog layer, including imagefog/simplefog fog layers.

notes.description: Hide pins below or above certain zoom levels. Don't let the minimum be equal to or greater than the maximum, or the note will never be displayed. (default range is 0.1 - 3)

minZoomLevel.name: Minimum Zoom Level
minZoomLevel.hint: Pin will be hidden when zoom is less than this level.

maxZoomLevel.name: Maximum Zoom Level
maxZoomLevel.hint: Pin will be hidden when zoom is greater than this level.

alwaysShowName.name: Always Show Pin Label
alwaysShowName.hint: Always show the label of this pin when the pin is visible.
